name: Backpacker's Pantry Three Cheese Mac & Cheese
description: Classic elbow macaroni in rich creamy sauce made from a blend of parmesan, Romano, and cheddar. A hearty serving of comfort food to enjoy anywhere.Ingredients: elbow macaroni (durum semolina flour (wheat), niacin, ferrous sulfate (iron), thiamine mononitrate, riboflavin and folic acid), cheddar cheese (pasteurized milk, cheese cultures, salt, enzymes, annatto), parmesan cheese (parmesan cheese (cultured part-skim milk, salt, enzymes), disodium phosphate, salt), romano cheese from cow's milk (cultured pasteurized part-skim milk, salt, enzymes, disodium phosphate), whole milk (rbst free), butter sauce (modified corn starch, salt, whey solids, non-fat dry milk, dehydrated butter, natural butter flavor, sugar, xanthan gum, lactic acid, turmeric and annatto), onion, sea salt, bacon flavor (maltodextrin, bacon type flavor (sunflower oil, smoke flavor, with other natural flavors), rice starch, salt, tocopherol (vitamin e)), black pepper, turmeric, nutmeg.Allergens: milk, gluten, and wheat.
